RC1.
I downloaded the attachement 1 of the bug 97655 on my disk, and exploded it.
Then I do "file > import, existing project into the workspace", pick the select root directory option and 
select the folder containing the project previously extracted.
Once selected the project do appear in the project list and is selected however the "finish" button can't 
be selected and I've noticed the following exception in the log:
